channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 01:44 Air alert in Poltava region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 游댮 01:44 Air alert in Poltava region. Stay tuned for further messages. #쮏혝햟쒬혧햨햟_쮏쐃햟혜혝혧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 23:34 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 游리 23:34 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 11:34 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 11:34 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community #Dnipropetrovsk_Oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
